T02D1961:98b-1: ya m'a ri s'a dha na /
T02D1961:98b-3: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1961:98b-4: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1961:98b-5: dpal ldan mthar mdzad thugs rje'i rang bzhin can //
T02D1961:98b-6: 'gro ba'i don du phyi rol gtum chen sku //
T02D1961:98b-7: mgon po gshin rje gshed la mgos btud de //
T02D1961:98b-8: de yi sgrub thabs 'dod pa'i don du ni //
T02D1961:98b-9: sngags pa dang po sems yongs mgu ba dang //
T02D1961:98b-10: bde ba'i stan gnas 'og tu dam bca' byas //
T02D1961:98b-11: snying gar h'um bkod pa las mchod pa'i tshogs //
T02D1961:98b-12: sna tshogs pa yi mgon la mngon par mchod //
T02D1961:98b-13: de yi spyan sngar sdig pa bshags la sogs //
T02D1961:98b-14: byas nas stong nyid yongs su bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1961:98b-15: dang por rlung gi dkyil 'khor yam las byung //
T02D1961:98b-16: du ba'i mdog 'dra gzhu yi dbyibs can la //
T02D1961:98b-17: ram gyi sa bon las byung me yi ni //
T02D1961:98b-18: dkyil 'khor gru gsum mdog kyang dmar ba yin //
T02D1961:98b-19: bam las byung ba'i chu yi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1961:98b-20: bum pa 'dra zhing dkar la thur ltas pa //
T02D1961:98b-21: lam las byung ba'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1961:98b-22: zur bzhi pa la kun nas rab tu ser //
T02D1961:98b-23: h'um sum h'um las byung ba'i ri rab ni //
T02D1961:98b-24: ri rgyal rtse mo brgyad pa go rims bzhin //
T02D1961:98b-25: sngar bshad rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams //
T02D1961:98b-26: gong nas gong ma'i rim pa bsams nas ni //
T02D1961:98b-27: de 'og h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje'i sa //
T02D1961:98b-28: ra ba dra ba dam pa dbus kyi char //
T02D1961:98b-29: aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis //
T02D1961:98b-30: dbus na bh'i: las byung ba'i 'jam rdo rje //
T02D1961:99a-0: @99a * // dpa' bo phyag g-yas ral gri mdzes pa dang //
T02D1961:99a-1: gzhon nu'i g-yon na thugs kar glegs bam bsnams //
T02D1961:99a-2: sku ni dmar ser zur phud lnga gnag cing //
T02D1961:99a-3: rdo rje skyil krung mchog bcas shin tu zhi //
T02D1961:99a-4: bsams la slar yang de yi thugs zla bar //
T02D1961:99a-5: hi las byung ba'i nyi ma 'char ka'i gzugs ;
T02D1961:99a-6: / kun nas 'od zer nag po 'phros pa yis //
T02D1961:99a-7: khams gsum khyab nas rgyal ba byang chub sems //
T02D1961:99a-8: khro bo rig pa gnas na legs bzhugs rnams //
T02D1961:99a-9: yang dag bskul te bkug nas nyi gzugs la //
T02D1961:99a-10: bcug la der ni gcig tu gyur pa na //
T02D1961:99a-11: slar yang nyi ma nyid du gyur pa las //
T02D1961:99a-12: 'od zer dmar po rab tu rgya che ba //
T02D1961:99a-13: shin tu 'bar ba spros nas de ru ni //
T02D1961:99a-14: h'um las byung ba'i rdo rje kha gyes gnag / lte bar h'um bcas sna tshogs 'od 'dra ba //
T02D1961:99a-15: de las rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' spros //
T02D1961:99a-16: slar yang de yis 'gro ba drug la gnas //
T02D1961:99a-17: sems can btul te byang chub mchog bkod nas //
T02D1961:99a-18: bkug ste thams cad rdo rje la rab gzhug /
T02D1961:99a-19: de 'og rdo rje n'i la yongs su gyur nas
T02D1961:99a-20: // gshin rje gshed po zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam //
T02D1961:99a-21: phyag g-yas rdo rje'i dbyig pa 'phyar ba dang //
T02D1961:99a-22: phyag g-yon sdigs mdzub rdo rje zhags pa can //
T02D1961:99a-23: gshin rje ma he'i steng na gan rgyal gnas //
T02D1961:99a-24: g-yas brkyang gnas pa yis ni gnon par mdzad //
T02D1961:99a-25: mi thung zhal ni rnam 'gyur mche ba gtsigs //
T02D1961:99a-26: gsus khyim che la ljags ni rnam par rkyong //
T02D1961:99a-27: dbu skra smin ma sma ra dmar ser ni //
T02D1961:99a-28: gyen du brdzes shing spyan gnyis rnam par dmar //
T02D1961:99a-29: gnag cing khro bcas gnyer ma dpral bar bsdus //
T02D1961:99a-30: phus 'debs klu brgyad kyis ni yan lag brgyan //
T02D1961:99a-31: stag lpags bsnams zhing thod pa'i rtse bran can //
T02D1961:99a-32: mgo bo'i phreng ba'i dong shal 'phyang mdzad cing //
T02D1961:99a-33: dus mtha'i me ltar 'jigs 'od rnam par 'bar //
T02D1961:99a-34: 'jigs par byed pa'ang 'jigs pa skyed par mdzad //
T02D1961:99a-35: gtum zhing gshin rje gshed tshogs sangs rgyas 'phro //
T02D1961:99a-36: 'jig rten lha mchog tshogs kyis phyag byas shing //
T02D1961:99a-37: ha ha ra bzhad pas lha dang lha min tshogs //
T02D1961:99a-38: kun nas yongs su skrag par mdzad pa'o //
T02D1961:99a-39: sa gsum dag na yod pa'i bdud kyi tshogs //
T02D1961:99b-0: ma lus @99b pa yang rnam pa 'byer bar mdzad //
T02D1961:99b-1: de ltar bsam gtan la brtson gnas pa ste //
T02D1961:99b-2: dogs pa med par nyin mtshan sngags zlos shing //
T02D1961:99b-3: de nyid sbyor bas dur khrod sogs par gnas //
T02D1961:99b-4: dam tshig rnam dag nges par 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D1961:99b-5: de yi sgrub thabs 'di ni legs bris las //
T02D1961:99b-6: bdag gis bsod nams gang thob des 'jig rten //
T02D1961:99b-7: gshin rje gshed mnyam 'gro kun sdug bsngal ni //
T02D1961:99b-8: mi bzad tshogs mthar bdud tshogs myur zad shog /
T02D1961:99b-9: gshin rje gshed kyi sgrub thabs slob dpon 'gro bzangs
T02D1961:99b-10: snying pos mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D1961:99b-12: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po d'i pa ka ra shr'i dzny'a na dang //
